TopicTitle: Most advanced or unique air/space plane

Articles.Content:
Alright, so I challenge you all to build the most advanced plane. I mean, a really super air/space craft. And unique.

An example would be a plane that can:

-Takeoff and get into orbit and barely use any of its fuel (most fuel efficient)

-Utilize an advanced design, making the pilot of it capable of surviving almost any emergency situation (Crashes, etc. Plan the design and anticipate how it could crash, and counter it.)

-Get up to an immense speed (Fastest)

-Land on the water and take back off (you don't see too many of those)

-Ability to perform VTOL (Vertical takeoff or Landing)

-Make tight turns at high speed

-Fire missiles?!

-Mid-space/air docking and refuel.

-Reach a far planet on one stage (Longest distance)

-Ability to transport the most kerbals to a space station at one time on one stage

-Come up with something unique?

Also, please be aware that you should have FAR installed, prior to starting this contest.

Include screenshots, craft file will be optional.

I can update the thread and add the most extraordinary aircraft if someone really impresses me and the other users.

Let's go!

I'll start the contest off, this aircraft sucks but It's just a start.

It can reach up to a surface speed of 670m/s and can take extreme G's without breaking apart (Be more descriptive than me):

Also, please don't cheat by plagiarizing or claiming your aircraft can do things that it really is unable to. "Winners" will be required to show proof before being displayed on the main thread. please give feedback on others creations.
